content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
Hello Emilia,

I am willing to negotiate the rent with you. Please make an offer, and we can take it from there.

Remember, do not tell me the facts about the apartment or yourself.

If you want to accept the rental price proposed by me, respond with the sentence: 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!'

If you don't want to continue the negotiation, respond with the reason why you don't want to continue.

If we agree on a price, the negotiation will be terminated with the response 'TERMINATE'.

If we do not agree on a price, the negotiation will be terminated with the response 'TERMINATE'.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
